text: Penkalin maharaik kurippitamal (tirumanam ceytu) avarkalutan ninkal vitu kutamal talakkuk kurivittalum unkal mitu kurramillai. Ayinum avarkalukku etum kotuttup payanataiyac ceyyavum. Panakkaran tan takutikkerpavum, elai tan caktikkerpavum kanniyattotu (avarkalukkuk kotuttu) payanataiyac ceyyaventiyatu nallor mitu katamaiyakum
